name: hm01
effect: Teaches Cut to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Cut to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Attacks the foe
with sharp blades
or claws.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Attacks the foe
with sharp blades
or claws.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A basic attack.
It can be used to
cut down thin trees
and grass.

trees.
